Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards. This product offers unparalleled benefits and features that could significantly enhance your operations or personal endeavors. Given its exceptional quality and capabilities, we believe it's worth more than $12000 to you. Considering this, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this product for an exclusive price of $15000. This offer includes not only the product itself but also a comprehensive support package to ensure seamless integration and optimal performance. Please let me know if you have any questions or need further information. We look forward to the possibility of working with you. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $15,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $15,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $15,000
